name: Stoichiometry of Combustion
description: Calculate the mass of CO2 produced from the complete combustion of a given mass of propane.

name: Acid-Base Titration
description: Determine the concentration of an unknown HCl solution by titrating it with a standard NaOH solution.

name: Redox Reaction Balancing
description: Balance a complex redox reaction in acidic solution using the half-reaction method.

name: Gas Laws and Molar Volume
description: A balloon contains a certain volume of gas at a specific temperature and pressure. Predict the new volume under new conditions.
